Usage¶

mathops.summation¶

To obtain the sum of an array, you can use the mathops.summation() function:

Functions:

summation(a)

Return summation result as floats.
mathops.summation.summation(a)[source]¶

Return summation result as floats.

Parameters

a (array) – array a

Returns

the sum

Return type

float
